bug.author: caprone
bug.description: """loading model""" nlp = spacy.load('en_core_web_sm') then if we call nlp on a string like 'LE' --> KeyError raise... nlp('LE') another example : nlp('Ag?') comments.comment: I believe this is fixed in v2.0.3
ok, thanks EDIT: also large model has SAME problems with some strings...
